name: GetPlayerColor
warnings: GetPlayerColor will return nothing (0) unless SetPlayerColor has been used first.Click HERE for a fix.
description: Gets the color of the player's name and radar marker. Only works after SetPlayerColor.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to get the color of.

return_values: The player's color. 0 if no color set or player not connected.
related_fn:
SetPlayerColor: Set a player's color.
 ChangeVehicleColor: Set the color of a vehicle.
